server module

class server.Server[source]

Bases: object

WebSocket server for the game.

Parameters:

  • (dict) (connected_players) – A dictionary mapping WebSocket connections to player IDs.

  • (Game) (game) – The game instance.

  • (MessageHandler) (message_handler) – The message handler instance.

  • first_shooting_client – The WebSocket connection of the first client who shoots.

async handle_recieved_message(websocket, player_id, message, index)[source]

Handles the received message based on its type.

Parameters:

  • websocket – The WebSocket connection.

  • (str) (message) – The ID of the player who sent the message.

  • (str) – The received message.

  • (int) (index) – The index of the player in the connected players list.

async handler(websocket)[source]

Handles a new WebSocket connection.

Parameters:

websocket – The WebSocket connection.

async recieveMessages(websocket)[source]

Receives messages from a WebSocket connection and handles them.

Parameters:

websocket – The WebSocket connection.
